subject: Re: Box alternatives.
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Ann:

Yes, I have experienced this too with the box, and get mad at myself 
for speaking over them, but maybe it cannot be helped.  Yet, even 
EVPs with no box seem to do the same...are our voices a carrier for 
their voices?  

I know the leading theory is manipulation of audio bits and white 
noise with the ghost box (which I admit it sounds like on the FB and 
MiniBox recordings), but I hear it more via "carrier" on top of the 
audio and white noise through the RS boxes.  

Just looking for input here...

;)

LC
